name: MachineMiner
short_description:
Problem :

There is a lot of data that we download on our machines, stuff that gets downloaded without our intention. There are files that we thought we'd use but haven't. All these files add up in the system to use a lot of space that could otherwise be better managed. 

Solution:

The MachineMiner tool will perform the following offline,

i.Run a audit of the system configuration.
ii.Run audit on users of the system
iii.Segregate files based on type,user,size 
iv.Let user choose a recommended file reorg structure and structure.

In a online(always running) mode the software would keep track of audits on the system and suggest stuff accordingly.
summary: DataMining on machine for better file organization
